author: M. Russell Ballard
quote: Life can be filled with faith, joy, happiness, hope, and love when we exercise the smallest amount of real faith in Christ.

author: Brian K. Taylor
quote: How can each of us experience the power of understanding our divine identity? It begins by seeking to know God, our Father.

author: Larry J. Echo Hawk
quote: We can all receive unspeakable peace and partnering with our Savior as we learn to freely forgive those who have trespassed against us.

author: Gary E. Stevenson
quote: We can rejoice that the Lord’s prophet is in place and that the Lord’s work is being done in the way that He has divinely prescribed.

author: Lynn G. Robbins
quote: Amid a life full of stumbling blocks and imperfection, we all are grateful for second chances.

author: Neil L. Andersen
quote: A prophet does not stand between you and the Savior. Rather, he stands beside you and points the way to the Savior.

author: David A. Bednar
quote: Meekness is a defining attribute of the Redeemer and is distinguished by righteous responsiveness, willing submissiveness, and strong self-restraint.

author: Taylor G. Godoy
quote: We all have a “today” to live, and the key to making our day successful is to be willing to sacrifice.

author: Bonnie L. Oscarson
quote: Every young woman in the Church should feel valued, have opportunities to serve, and feel that she has something of worth to contribute to this work.

author: Taniela B. Wakolo
quote: Participating in ordinances and honoring the associated covenants will bring you marvelous light and protection in this ever-darkening world.

author: Devin G. Durrant
quote: I plead for heaven’s help as we strive to be Christlike teachers in our homes.

author: Dale G. Renlund
quote: When we gather our family histories and go to the temple on behalf of our ancestors, God fulfills promised blessings simultaneously on both sides of the veil.

author: Douglas D. Holmes
quote: Your Aaronic Priesthood ordination is central to helping God’s children receive Christ’s atoning power.

author: Russell M. Nelson
quote: We announce a significant restructuring of our Melchizedek Priesthood quorums to accomplish the work of the Lord more effectively.

author: D. Todd Christofferson
quote: Having one Melchizedek Priesthood quorum in a ward unifies priesthood holders to accomplish all aspects of the work of salvation.

author: Ronald A. Rasband
quote: What a joy it will be for all Melchizedek Priesthood holders to have the blessing of teaching, learning, and serving shoulder to shoulder.

author: Henry B. Eyring
quote: We receive the Holy Spirit best when we are focused on serving others. That is why we have the priesthood responsibility to serve for the Savior.

author: Dallin H. Oaks
quote: The magnifying of the holy priesthood you hold is vital to the work of the Lord in your families and in your Church callings.

author: Russell M. Nelson
quote: We will minister in His name, with His power and authority, and with His loving-kindness.

author: Larry Y. Wilson
quote: What an incomparable gift comes to those who put their faith in Jesus Christ. That gift is the Holy Spirit.

author: Reyna I. Aburto
quote: In order to reach our sublime destiny, we need each other, and we need to be unified.

author: Massimo De Feo
quote: The gospel of Jesus Christ is centered on the love of the Father and the Savior for us and our love for Them and for one another.

author: Claudio D. Zivic
quote: Let us be faithful to what we have believed and know.

author: Henry B. Eyring
quote: I pray with all my heart that you will hear the voice of the Spirit, which is sent to you so generously.

author: Dallin H. Oaks
quote: We need to be reminded that in total and over a significant period of time, seemingly small things bring to pass great things.

author: Russell M. Nelson
quote: In coming days, it will not be possible to survive spiritually without the guiding, directing, comforting, and constant influence of the Holy Ghost.

author: Gerrit W. Gong
quote: This is Easter Sunday. I reverently witness and solemnly testify of the living Christ—He who “died, was buried, and rose again the third day.”

author: Ulisses Soares
quote: Having prophets is a sign of God’s love for His children. They make known the promises and the true nature of God and of Jesus Christ.

author: Russell M. Nelson
quote: We will implement a newer, holier approach to caring for and ministering to others.

author: Jeffrey R. Holland
quote: Our prayer today is that every man and woman will leave this general conference more deeply committed to heartfelt care for one another.

author: Jean B. Bingham
quote: May we show our gratitude and love for God by ministering with love to our eternal sisters and brothers.

author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quote: Those who find a way to truly behold the Man find the doorway to life’s greatest joys and the balm to life’s most demanding despairs.

author: Gérald Caussé
quote: The Church is all about you, the Lord’s disciples—those who love and follow Him and who have taken His name upon them.

author: Quentin L. Cook
quote: Pursuing divinely appointed responsibilities in righteousness, unity, and equality will prepare us to meet God.

author: Russell M. Nelson
quote: Your desire to obey will be enhanced as you remember and reflect upon what you have felt these past two days.
